mapper.select: select Epnum, Epi_subject, Epi_content, Epi_date, Epi_recommand, Epi_readcount from episode, novel where episode.Nnum = novel.Nnum and novel.Nnum = #{nnum}
select Epnum, Epi_subject, Epi_date, Epi_recommand, Epi_readcount from episode, novel where episode.Nnum = novel.Nnum and novel.Nnum = #{nnum} order by Epi_date
mapper.insert: insert into episode(Epnum, Epi_subject, Epi_content, Epi_date, Epi_recommand, Epi_readcount, Nnum) values(seq_episode.nextval, #{Epi_subject}, #{Epi_content}, sysdate, #{Epi_recommand}, 0, #{novelDTO.nnum})
mapper.update: update episode set Epi_subject=#{Epi_subject}, Epi_content=#{Epi_content}, Epi_recommand=#{Epi_recommand} where Epnum = #{epnum}
mapper.select: update episode set Epi_readcount=Epi_readcount+1 where Epnum=#{epnum}
select EPNUM,EPI_SUBJECT,NNUM from episode where Epnum = #{Epnum}
